mapper.sql: id as id , nickname as nickname , headimgurl as headimgurl , sex as sex , city as city , country as country , province as province , weixin as weixin , agencyId as agencyId , userId as userId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO power_user_expand ( nickname, headimgurl, sex, city, country, province, weixin, agencyId, userId ) VALUES ( #{nickname}, #{headimgurl}, #{sex}, #{city}, #{country}, #{province}, #{weixin}, #{agencyId}, #{userId} )

INSERT INTO power_user_expand ( nickname, headimgurl, sex, city, country, province, weixin, agencyId, userId ) VALUES ( #{map.nickname}, #{map.headimgurl}, #{map.sex}, #{map.city}, #{map.country}, #{map.province}, #{map.weixin}, #{map.agencyId}, #{map.userId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE power_user_expand
nickname = #{nickname},
headimgurl = #{headimgurl},
sex = #{sex},
city = #{city},
country = #{country},
province = #{province},
weixin = #{weixin},
agencyId = #{agencyId},
userId = #{userId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE power_user_expand
nickname = #{map.nickname},
headimgurl = #{map.headimgurl},
sex = #{map.sex},
city = #{map.city},
country = #{map.country},
province = #{map.province},
weixin = #{map.weixin},
agencyId = #{map.agencyId},
userId = #{map.userId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE power_user_expand
nickname = #{update.nickname},
headimgurl = #{update.headimgurl},
sex = #{update.sex},
city = #{update.city},
country = #{update.country},
province = #{update.province},
weixin = #{update.weixin},
agencyId = #{update.agencyId},
userId = #{update.userId},
${nativeSql}
mapper.select:

, id

, agencyId
, userId
FROM power_user_expand
${nativeSql}
ORDER BY
${sort.field} ${sort.order}
LIMIT 0,1

FROM power_user_expand
